CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISNULL(Feature_T_Shirt_Size_Roll_Up__c), Feature_T_Shirt_Size_Roll_Up__c = "Not Estimated", Feature_T_Shirt_Size_Roll_Up__c = ""), TEXT(Feature_T_Shirt_Size_High_Level__c), Feature_T_Shirt_Size_Roll_Up__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Final T-Shirt Sizing to be used, takes the roll-up size if it exists else uses the high-level size
CustomField.label: Overall T-Shirt Size
